entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Englee
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:20 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -21.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Englee 12:30 AM NST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: -21.5°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 27 except minus 21 along parts of the coast.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 27 except minus 21 along parts of the coast. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 39 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 39 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 24 except minus 19 along parts of the coast.
